fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Climate Action

section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
"Growing media EUROPE" www.growing-media.eu/  
 Energy Peat Europe (EPE) www.energypeat.eu/ International Peat Society (IPS)  www.peatsociety.org
goals__remit:
LPA unites Latvian peat producers, entrepreneurs and natural persons, which have given significant investment for the industry development. 
The aim of the Association is to stimulate the development of Latvian peat producers’ industry, creation of workplaces and a rational, environment-friendly and sustainable use of peat resources, preservation of biodiversity and bog resources, as well as to represent and defend the interests of members.
relevant_communication:
Work in "Growing media EUROPE", Energy Peat Europe (EPE), International Peat Society ( IPS);  
EU LIFE program project ‘"Sustainable and responsible management and re-use of degraded peatlands in Latvia’’ (LIFE REstore, LIFE14 CCM/LV/001103)
